name: GEOGPAPHY
text: Geography is the study of places and the relationships between people and their environments.

name: MICROSCOPE
text: A microscope is a laboratory instrument used to examine objects that are too small to be seen by the naked eye.

name: ART LABS
text: ART Labs introduces tailor-made AR-commerce. A specially designed, effortless, 3D-powered boost for eCommerce.

name: MATHEMATICS
text: Mathematicians seek and use patterns to formulate; they resolve the truth or falsity of such by mathematical proof.
